## NFTDrop.totalUnclaimedSupply() method

Get the total unclaimed supply of this drop

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
totalUnclaimedSupply(): Promise<number>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;number&gt;

the total supply

## Example


```jsx
const supply = await program.totalUnclaimedSupply();
```
